clause.title: Separation from other areas and buildings

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Each of the divisional areas required by TAS I13D2 other than the administration and staff amenities building, must beâ€”

ol.li: separated from each of the other divisional areas by means of an impervious wall with an FRL of not less than 120/120/120; or
separated from all other buildings by a clear space of not less than 6 m.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Notwithstanding the distance requirements of (1), bulk stores of polyols and bulk stores of isocyanates must comply with the requirements of the Work Health and Safety Act.
